name: Skellie dummies
description:
IF YOU DONT HAVE METAMASK PRESS SPACE TO PLAY

Kill skeletons until boss spawns and then kill him.

CONTROLS:

W A S D for movement

mouse for looking around

Left mouse button for light Attack

Right mouse button for Heavy Attack

R T F G used to cast a spell - Fire(R), Ice(T), Lightning(F), Wind(G)

To cast a spell press R T F or G and then left mouse button to cast or right mouse button to cancel

After casting spell you cant cast again for 10 seconds.

SHIFT to sprint

SPACE to jump

Enemies drop heatlh potions

Lync Portal link: https://portal.lync.world/#/play-game/U2FsdGVkX19V5vs1L2a3S4h0dyytRhB69jRYfzOHij...

This game is far from finished. I had a lot less time then i expected but i plan to finish my ideas in the future. 

Things i plan to add: 

Inventory for items

Item drops (weapons) with randomly generated stats - item generator is already created

Better map

Ranged attack for both enemy and player

Shield for blocking

Better camera

and some more stuff
